ul.li: Journal of Advances in Information Fusion (JAIF)

div.h1: Tracking with Multisensor Out-of-Sequence Measurements with Residual Biases
div.p: Shuo Zhang, Yaakov Bar-Shalom and Gregory Watson

ul.li: Y. Bar-Shalom, X. R. Li, and T. Kirubarajan Estimation with Applications to Tracking and Navigation: Theory, Algorithms and Software. J. Wiley and Sons, 2001.
Update with out-of-sequence measurements in tracking: Exact solution. IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems, 38, 3 (July 2002), 769—778.
One-step solution for the multistep out-of-sequence mea- surement problem in tracking. IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems, AES-40, 1 (Jan. 2004), 27—37.
IMM estimator with out-of-sequence measurements. IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems, AES-41, 1 (Jan. 2005), 90—98.
Design and Analysis of Modern Tracking Systems. Artech House, 1999.
Tracking with Time-Delayed Data in Multisensor Systems. NSWCDD/TR-93/351, Aug. 1993, Dahlgren, VA.
Stochastic Processes and Filtering Theory. Academic Press, 1970.
On Accumulatd State Densities with Applications to out- of-sequence measurement processing. Proceedings of the 12th International Conference on Infor- mation Fusion, Seattle, WA, July 2009.
Exact multisensor dynamic bias estimation with local tracks. IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems, AES-40, 2 (Apr. 2004), 576—590.
